scenes.background: Monica glances at her watch, looking concerned.
scenes.description: Bob says, Were running out of time. We need to wrap this up.

options.text: I hear you, Bob. Let's summarize our key points quickly.
options.analysis: You show empathy by acknowledging Bob's concern and aim to quickly summarize, demonstrating good social skills and emotional perception.

options.text: Agreed, but let's ensure we cover all critical aspects before concluding.
options.analysis: You balance the need for thorough coverage with time constraints, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: We can always extend the meeting if necessary. Rushing might lead to errors.
options.analysis: You suggest extending the meeting to ensure thorough discussion, showing empathy and motivation to avoid mistakes.
